Being a woman online is a paradox cuz you post pics of your spouse/partner online, ppl get mad & unfollow.

If you hide them people say youâ€™re baiting and leading them on.

And then if youâ€™re single, people think you owe them their time or that youâ€™re inherently up for grabs.

content: I think what people don't get is there's no "opt out" for women. Being attached is a desirable attribute in a male content producer for both men and women- he's got a wife/GF, men want to be like him/women find him respectable. It's a non-threatening default. Not so for women.
